Package org.neo4j.internal.schema

Interface IndexRef<T extends IndexRef<T>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SchemaDescriptorSupplier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndexDescriptor, IndexPrototype
    public interface IndexRef<T extends IndexRef<T>>
extends SchemaDescriptorSupplier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IndexConfig getIndexConfig()  
      IndexProviderDescriptor getIndexProvider()
      Returns the IndexProviderDescriptor of the index provider for this index.
      IndexType getIndexType()
      Returns the IndexType of this index.
      boolean isUnique()
      Returns true if this index is only meant to allow one value per key.
      T withIndexConfig​(IndexConfig indexConfig)
      Produce a new index reference that is the same as this index reference in every way, except it has the given index config.
      T withIndexProvider​(IndexProviderDescriptor indexProvider)
      Produce a new index reference that is the same as this index reference in every way, except it has the given index provider descriptor.
      T withSchemaDescriptor​(SchemaDescriptor schema)
      Produce a new index reference that is the same as this index reference in every way, except it has the given schema descriptor.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.neo4j.internal.schema.SchemaDescriptorSupplier

        schema, userDescription

    • Method Detail

      • isUnique

        boolean isUnique()
        Returns true if this index is only meant to allow one value per key.

      • getIndexType

        IndexType getIndexType()
        Returns the IndexType of this index.

      • getIndexProvider

        IndexProviderDescriptor getIndexProvider()
        Returns the IndexProviderDescriptor of the index provider for this index.

      • withIndexProvider

        T withIndexProvider​(IndexProviderDescriptor indexProvider)
        Produce a new index reference that is the same as this index reference in every way, except it has the given index provider descriptor.
        Parameters:
        indexProvider - The index provider descriptor used in the new index reference.
        Returns:
        A new index reference with the given index provider.

      • withSchemaDescriptor

        T withSchemaDescriptor​(SchemaDescriptor schema)
        Produce a new index reference that is the same as this index reference in every way, except it has the given schema descriptor.
        Parameters:
        schema - The schema descriptor used in the new index reference.
        Returns:
        A new index reference with the given schema descriptor.

      • getIndexConfig

        IndexConfig getIndexConfig()
        Returns:
        the attached IndexConfig.

      • withIndexConfig

        T withIndexConfig​(IndexConfig indexConfig)
        Produce a new index reference that is the same as this index reference in every way, except it has the given index config.
        Parameters:
        indexConfig - The index config of the new index reference.
        Returns:
        A new index reference with the given index config.
